title: What are the exact qualifications and ages to become a judge in the Karnataka district court? - Quora

response.answer_text: Citizen of INdia (By Birth or Naturalization for at least 15 years)Must be a practising lawyer at High COurt for 15 years or more or a Practising Lawyer at Sessions COurts for 20 years of more or a distinguished writer of at least 2 Judicial booksMust be an actively enrolled lawyer.Must be less than 58 years old at the time of taking or assuming rank. [This is unoffical and not an official qualification]Must be able to serve as HC Judge for no less than 3 years from date of appointment.
